# News and Analysis Stream 1 & 2 RFP under SA EN578-191713

## RFP Overview

The Government of Canada is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) from qualified contractors to provide media monitoring services for the Canada Energy Regulator (CER).

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3823224802-Doc3823280503
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Publication Date**: 08 February 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 06 March 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 01 April 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Applicable
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Service Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing curated daily newsletters summarizing media and social media information relevant to the CER and its mandate. The provided services should facilitate information dissemination, identify emerging issues, and track the performance of CER activities.

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Brad Giulia
* **Email Address**: [giulia.brad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:giulia.brad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Important Notes

* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 EST on 06 March 2023.
* Submissions received after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.
* The RFP announcement is hosted on the Canada Buys website. Ariba Discovery will not be used for this procurement.  Please reference the Amendments to the Response Deadline Closing Time and Canada Buys posting closing time.
